QuestData.Title: Hoofing It
QuestData.Description: Okay, we done! Time to go back. No crocolisk to ride this time though.$B$BIf we go east and stay near ridge, it should lead all the way back near hill.$B$BNeed to be careful not to go far below ridge though or we might go right into big-tongue tree village thing. Zepik not think they like us right now.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find your way back to Frenzyheart Hill and speak to High-Shaman Rakjak.
QuestData.RewardText: Blown up by lightning?$B$B<Rakjak breaks out laughing for a moment.>$B$BYou good hunter. Rakjak like you. Maybe one day you can be honorary Frenzyheart!$B$BOnly maybe though!
